error.title: Error page!
error.403: You are not authorized to access the page.

sql.drivernotfound: The driver for the connection is not installed
sql.queryerror: The SQL query could not be executed
sql.extractionerror: The data result could not be recovered

REST.urlerror: The URL format is not correct. Please mind the HTTP or HTTPS protocol
REST.jsonerror: The URL does not have a correct JSON format
REST.valueerror: There was an error extracting the value
REST.nocredentials: Authorization credentials are required to access this URL
REST.wrongcredentials: The provided authentication credentials are wrong
REST.monitoringerror: An error occurred while checking the variable value

controlvariable.nointeger: Data must be an integer number

event.wrongdates: The starting date must be before or equal to the ending date
